articles.title: DPRK Media Organizations Reveal Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of Media
articles.content:
DPRK Media Organizations Reveal Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of Media
Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Journalists Union of Korea and the Press Sub-Committee of the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration made public an indictment denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for suppressing media in south Korea. 
					Referring to the coup against media effected by the Lee conservative group which put the past military regime into the shade, the indictment went on:
					
					On February 26, 2008 just a day after the "presidential" inaugural ceremony, the group of Lee passed the "bill on establishment and operation of the Broadcasting and Communication Committee" and on Feb. 29 it set up the committee by combining the Broadcasting Committee and the Ministry of Information and Communication and put it directly under the "president". 
					
					Lee Myung Bak appointed Choe Si Jung called "shade of president" as the head of the committee and replaced the heads of main press organs including KBS, MBC and YTN by his close confidants. 
					
					Lee's close associates took the posts of heads of OBS, English broadcasting Arirang TV and the News Information Promoting Council, biggest shareholder of the Yonhap News, one by one. 
					
					The Lee group retrogressively revised the "law on newspapers" which the past "government for people" enacted to restrict the conservative papers' monopolistic access to media market. It even tasked the conservative papers with the double mission of broadcasting. 
					
					As a result, the "government"-run broadcasting system collapsed and the clan-oriented media held sway over the south Korean media field, turning media reptile and conservative as a whole. This was the fascist violation putting into the shade the Chun Doo Hwan military regime which earned an ill fame for its act of merging or reorganizing press organs in 1980. 
					
					The Lee group kicked up massive suppression of the progressive media after taking power. 
					
					Owing to the suppression by the conservative group, more than 180 pressmen were punished and at least 60 were prosecuted on charges of "disturbance of performance of duties and violation of the law on assembly and demonstration" till 2010 since the appearance of the Lee's regime. 
					
					The conservative group blocked the article-exchange and contacts abroad which had been held between the Press Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration and the Press Sub-Committee of its North Side Committee. 
					
					In July 2011, the Intelligence Service and police of south Korea arrested en masse personages of political, academic, civic and public circles and put them into custody under the pretext of "spy action at the instructions of the north" and "establishment of anti-government network". 
					
					The conservative media which turned into the waiting maid of the power and reptile trumpeter did tremendous harm to the north-south relations by inciting confrontation while availing themselves of the Lee group's "north policy". 
					
					They actively shielded the targeting incident in 2011 which broke out by the military warmongers of south Korea. 
					
					They did not hesitate to let loose reckless remarks that the crucial step taken by the DPRK as regards the recent hideous provocation by a unit of the south Korean puppet army insulting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK was aimed to achieve internal unity. Worse still, they backed the Lee group's acts of sycophantic treachery. 
					
					The Lee group can never silence the voices for justice and truth however hard they may try to suppress the media. 
					
					Pressmen in the DPRK send support and solidarity to the general strike of the south Korean pressmen and believe that their just struggle to achieve freedom of speech and social justice and dynamically carry on the trend of the June 15 era of reunification will emerge victorious.

articles.title: Congratulations to Senegalese President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Senegalese President
Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to Macky Sall upon his election as president of Senegal.
					Kim Yong Nam in the message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would steadily grow stronger and sincerely wished him success in his responsible work to achieve national unity and socio-economic progress.

articles.title: Greeting to Senegalese President
articles.content:
Greeting to Senegalese President
Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Tuesday sent a message of greeting to Macky Sall, president of Senegal, on the 52nd anniversary of its independence.
					Kim in his message expressed belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would steadily grow stronger in the future, too and sincerely wished him greater success in his responsible work to achieve national reconciliation and unity and socio-economic progress.

articles.title: Credentials to Kim Yong Nam from Norwegian Ambassador
articles.content:
Credentials to Kim Yong Nam from Norwegian Ambassador
Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Torbjorn Holthe, Norwegian ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday.
					After receiving the credentials, Kim had a talk with the ambassador.

articles.title: DPRK Government Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Government Delegation Back Home
Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- A DPRK government delegation led by Kim Chang Ryong, councilor of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, came back home on Tuesday after visiting Cambodia.
					Arriving here on the same day were Yehia Zakaria Khairullah, chairman of the Egyptian Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, to participate in the grand world meeting on the Juche idea and an art troupe of the International United Confederation of Koreans to take part in the 28th April Spring Friendship Art Festival.

articles.title: Service Personnel of KPISF Vow to Devotedly Defend Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Service Personnel of KPISF Vow to Devotedly Defend Kim Jong Un
Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- A meeting of service personnel of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces (KPISF) took place before the statue of President Kim Il Sung at the Ministry of People's Security Tuesday. They vowed to hold Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem forever and devotedly defend Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un.
					Present there were Ri Myong Su, minister of People's Security, Ri Pyong Sam, director of the Political Bureau of the KPISF, officials of the ministry, people's security personnel and service personnel of the KPISF.
					
					Led by the minister, its participants made a solemn pledge to hold Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in high esteem for all ages as the sun of Juche, sun of Songun, successfully carry out the behests of peerlessly great men and remain faithful to the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					They said that they will consolidate Pyongyang and the whole country as a fortress for defending the leader, holding aloft the slogan "Let us defend the Party Central Committee headed by the dear respected Kim Jong Un with our lives!"
					
					They determined to push ahead with the construction of major projects and undertake more good work for the people, aware of the mission and duty as protectors of their lives and properties and thus contribute to bringing the Party's plan for building a thriving nation into full bloom.

articles.title: New Poster Produced in DPRK
articles.content:
New Poster Produced in DPRK
Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- A poster for the international festival in commemoration of the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung was produced in the run-up to the Day of the Sun. 
					In the upper part of the poster with a world map in the background is a picture of Mt. Paektu, the sacred mountain of the revolution, and letters reading "1912-2012".
					
					Portrayed in its center is President Kim Il Sung's old home in Mangyongdae and immortal flower Kimilsungia in full bloom.
					
					It also has letters saying "International Festival in Commemoration of the Centenary of the Birth of the Great President Kim Il Sung".
					
					With the number "100" in the background amid flowers, the poster has a list of the international preparatory committees and regional preparatory committees for commemorating the President's birth centenary and the names of the countries that will take part in the festival as well as the period and venue of the festival. 
					
					The poster will contribute to giving a momentum to the atmosphere of the international festival to be held in Mt. Paektu and Pyongyang to mark the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Academic Degrees and Titles Awarded to Intellectuals
articles.content:
Academic Degrees, Titles Awarded to Intellectuals
Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- State academic degrees and titles were conferred on intellectuals who have performed scientific and technological achievements on the occasion of the 100th anniversary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung. 
					An awarding ceremony took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Tuesday.
					
					The title of candidate academician was awarded to Kim Su Gon, teacher at Kim Il Sung University, Paek Nong I, room chief of Kim Chaek University of Technology, Hwang Ji Chol, first deputy-director of Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory, Mun Song Ryop, researcher of the Academy of Social Sciences, and Ri Ung Ho, researcher of the Pyongyang Horticulture Guidance Bureau.
					
					Professorship went to Pak Won Thae, department head of Pyongyang Medical College of Kim Il Sung University, Ri Ui Gu, vice-president of the State Academy of Sciences, and others.
					
					Doctor's degree was conferred upon Kim Gyun, first vice-president of Kim Il Sung University, Kim Yun Sik, vice department head of Kim Il Sung Higher Party School, Ri Su Chol and Kim Yong Ryong, room chiefs of Kim Chaek University of Technology, and others.
					
					The title of associate professor went to 67 intellectuals.

articles.title: Oratorical Contest Given by Women's Union Members
articles.content:
Women's Union Members Hold Oratorical Contest
Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- An oratorical contest was staged here on Tuesday by members of the women's union to remain faithful to the Songun revolutionary leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea on the occasion of the 19th anniversary of election of leader Kim Jong Il as chairman of the National Defence Commission.
					The performers praised Kim Jong Il for providing the eternal foundation for the prosperity of the country and the happiness of its people while spending all his life in the forefront of revolution and performing the undying feats for the era and history.
					
					Kim Jong Il was the symbol of the dignity and mightiness of Songun Korea, they stressed.
					
					They also spoke highly of the comradeship of Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un who calls all service personnel and people his comrades-in-arms.
					
					The future of Korea and the rising generations to come is rosy as there is Kim Jong Un, they said.

articles.title: Seminar on Publication of Kim Jong Il's Work Held
articles.content:
Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Work Held
Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- A seminar took place here on Tuesday to mark the fifth anniversary of the publication of leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Grand People's Study House Is Noble Legacy of the Great Leader and Grand Hall for All-People Study". 
					The work published on April 11, 2007 comprehensively clarifies the character, mission, position and role of the house and other ideological and theoretical issues. It also gives the most scientific clarification of the house's appearance as an important base for all-people education. 
					
					Present at the seminar were officials of ministries, national institutions and in the fields of science and education and officials and employees of the study house and scientists and technicians in Pyongyang. 
					
					The participants paid silent tribute to Kim Jong Il in the deepest reverence. 
					
					They heard five papers proving the validity, advantages and vitality of the all-people education policy of the Workers' Party of Korea and Korean-style social education system. 
					
					The speakers said that Kim Jong Il's work is a famous one which gives perfect answers to all issues arising in enforcing all-people education for the first time in the human history of education. 
					
					The originality of the idea clarified by the work lies in that it opened a new chapter in making a contribution to the development of science and technology in the country by raising the politico-ideological, cultural, scientific and technical level of the working people, they said. 
					
					They called upon the officials and other working people to glorify long the feats of the great persons of Mt. Paektu associated with the grand hall for all-people study and remain loyal to the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Study of Reminiscences Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Study of Reminiscences Brisk in DPRK
Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The book "Reminiscences of Anti-Japanese Guerrillas" was awarded People's Prize in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					Its first volume was issued in May Juche 48 (1959).
					
					The book is of great significance in imbuing the local people with the Paektu spirit, displayed by the anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters during the Japanese colonial rule over Korea.
					
					With this spirit the guerrillas devotedly defended President Kim Il Sung, the center of unity and leadership, and defeated the Japanese imperialist aggressors to liberate the country.
					
					The book deals with the undying feats the President performed while leading the anti-Japanese war to victory as well as the heroic struggle of the guerillas for national liberation.
					
					The Korean people carry on the study of reminiscences through readings, seminars and film shows.
					
					Many reminiscences were filmized, including "Comrades! Please Take This Pistol", "Fighter on Mt. Chonbo" and "Story of An Sun Hwa".
					
					The study makes servicepersons and civilians harden their determination to defend the dear respected Kim Jong Un devotedly, following the example of the anti-Japanese guerillas in defending Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: National Symposium on Medical Science Held
articles.content:
National Symposium on Medical Science Held
Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- A national symposium on medical science was held here on April 2 and 3 to commemorate the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					The symposium was divided into panels of internal medicine, surgery, Koryo medicine, hygienic and anti-epidemic work, and basic and pharmacy medicine. 
					
					The participants heard more than 530 papers dealing with the successes gained by scientists, teachers researchers in the field of public health and medical workers in their researches. 
					
					Many papers were highly appreciated by the participants for their great clinical importance and value in practice.
					
					Ri Pong Hun, chairman of the Central Committee of the Medical Association of Korea, in an address an a closing ceremony on April 3 underscored the need to positively contributing to developing the medical science and technology by pushing forward the drive for acquiring cutting-edge science and technology, and improving preventive and curative healthcare.

articles.title: Humankind Awards Many Titles to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Humankind Awards Many Titles to Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Hundreds of millions of world people, attracted by President Kim Il Sung, awarded a lot of titles to him during his entire revolutionary career irrespective of idea, social system, political view and religion.
					Kim Il Sung is the august name of the sun. The name was given by the Korean people, praising him as the sun of the nation after acclaiming him as the great leader for the first time in the nation's history spanning 5 000 years.
					
					The president of Zambia visited the DPRK to congratulate President Kim Il Sung on his 70th birthday and recited before the President a poem "To Comrade Kim Il Sung who loves humankind" written by himself. In this poem he lauded the President as a "standard-bearer of the oppressed people."
					
					I.V. Stalin who was the leader of the party and people of the Soviet Union praised Kim Il Sung in 1949 as a genuine proletarian internationalist who devotedly protected the Soviet Union with arms from the invasion of imperialism in the East and a model of the communist movement.
					
					Chairman Mao Zedong of China, greeting Kim Il Sung on visit to China in April 1975, said he deemed it his great happiness to have such great man of world stature as his closest comrade-in-arms and brother.
					
					Fidel Castro, leader of the Cuban revolution, respecting Kim Il Sung as a revolutionary forerunner, praised him as the most experienced and prestigious man of the leaders in the world and a genius.
					
					Ho Chi Minh, president of Vietnam, deeply impressed by his idea of believing in people as in Heaven and his virtues, praised him as an excellent popular statesman without an equal in the world. Norodom Sihanouk, great king of Cambodia, lauded Kim Il Sung as the greatest-ever man who invariably maintained the close relations once he forged.
					
					The former vice prime minister of Japan who exercised strongest influence in the political circles in Japan and the former chancellor of Austria and other high-ranking political figures of the West said   Kim Il Sung was the "man to whom they paid highest tribute" and the "unworldly minded and kind-hearted leader they met for the first time in the history of political activities."
					
					Jimmy Carter, former president of the U.S., met him during his visit to the DPRK in June 1994 and admired him for his greatness.
					
					During the mourning period after the untimely demise of the President media of at least 120 countries of the world released special reports on the events held after his demise. They vied with each other to praise him as "The sun illuminating the world for all ages", "Unquenchable flames", "The great sun of mankind without an equal on our planet," etc.
					
					Prominent personages and people of the world authored great many books, reminiscences and poems including "The sun of Juche will be immortal", "Kim Il Sung -- he is the savior of humankind", "Becoming an unquenchable torch illuminating the whole world", "President Kim Il Sung is the great statesman in the 20th century", "President Kim Il Sung is the eternal sun of our destiny," etc.

articles.title: "Unha" Garment Products Popular among Consumers
articles.content:
"Unha" Garments Enjoy Popularity in DPRK
Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Garments with trademark of "Unha" are popular in the DPRK.
					The demand for them is steadily increasing at Pyongyang Department Store No.1, Kwangbok Area Supermarket and other commercial centers.
					
					Suits, padded garments and sportswear produced at the Tongdaewon Unha Garment Factory are in great demand.
					
					Choe Yong Nam, manager of the factory, told the KCNA:
					
					"It is very important to ensure constant progress in making new products. We have set it as the main goal to keep our products popular in local and foreign markets."
					
					All the production processes of the factory from designing to processing are streamlined.
					
					Its products have been exported to many countries in Southeast Asia and Europe."

articles.title: Bags Popular among Consumers
articles.content:
Bags Popular among Consumers
Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Sales of bags designed by the Korean Sangmyong Trading Corporation are on increase nowadays.
					They are put on sale at Pyongyang Department Store No.1, Kwangbok Area Supermarket, Pothonggang Department Store and other shopping malls.
					
					Kim Kum Ju, a worker at the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Silk Mill, told KCNA at the supermarket that the bags are popular among women.
					
					In particular, portmanteaus and satchels are very popular among sportspersons.
					
					Pak Kyong Im, chief of the corporation's design office, said the sample bags enjoy high appreciation at the Pyongyang Daily Necessities Factory, Phyongchon Bag Factory and other production units.

articles.title: Organic Composite Fertilizer Factory Commissioned
articles.content:
Organic Composite Fertilizer Factory Commissioned
Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- An organic composite fertilizer factory was built in the area of Phyongchon, Pyongyang. A completion ceremony took place on Tuesday.
					The factory will contribute to the agricultural production, greening and environmental protection.
					
					Equipped with outdoor loading site and mixing, maturation and production places in the area covering more than 23 000 square meters, the factory will mass-produce quality organic fertilizer with the use of mud from River Pothong, sewage deposit and soot in a comprehensive manner.
					
					Present at the ceremony were Premier Choe Yong Rim, Mun Kyong Dok, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea and chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK, Ri Kyong Sik, minister of Agriculture, Hwang Hak Won, minister of Urban Management, officials concerned, employees of the factory and other people in the city.

articles.title: 618 Cement Factory Comes online
articles.content:
618 Cement Factory Comes Online
Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The 618 Cement Factory went operational with due ceremony in the DPRK on Tuesday.
					The newly built factory is a gift presented to the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung and the 4th Conference of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					The factory would produce cement, contributing to the construction of major projects and the development of the industry of building materials of the country.

articles.title: Snow Hits Korea in April
articles.content:
Snow Hits Korea in April
Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Abnormal weather has been witnessed in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea on Monday and Tuesday.
					Snow hit most areas of the country, Kangwon, South Hamgyong, Jagang and Ryanggang provinces in particular, according to the weather data from 03:00 Monday to 15:00 Tuesday.
					
					There were 16~24 centimeters of snowfall in those areas. In terms of precipitation, 48, 47 and 42 millimeters were registered respectively in Kosong, Kosan and Thongchon counties of Kangwon Province, 45 and 43 millimeters in Paechon and Pongchon counties of South Hwanghae Province and 41 millimeters in Thosan County of North Hwanghae Province.
					
					A weather expert told KCNA that more than 10 millimeters of snow mixed with rain fell in Pyongyang, Phyongsong and Chongjin cities and other areas of the country. Heavy snowfall was reported on east coastal areas, rare to be seen in this season.
					
					The snowfall was accompanied with wind 16m per second, causing tidal waves on the east and west coasts of the country.
					
					Such abnormal weather is adversely affecting agriculture in the country.

articles.title: "Kim Il Sung's Korea", Special Write-ups to Centenary of His Birth (18)
articles.content:
"Kim Il Sung's Korea", Special Write-ups to Centenary of His Birth (18)
Kim Il Sung Advances Theses on Socialist Rural Question
					
					Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea successfully carried out transformation of agriculture on socialist line in the early 1960s.
					
					But the century-old feudalistic backwardness and poverty still remained in rural communities.
					
					At that time President Kim Il Sung began working to acquaint himself with the overall agricultural situation to settle the rural question in the country. 
					
					In this regard, he told an official that the country was suffering difference between industry and agriculture, between the working class and the peasantry and between urban and rural communities.
					
					He then underscored the need to find a key to minimizing the differences. 
					
					In Juche 52 (1963) alone, he made guidance tours of many rural communities in North and South Hwanghae, Ryanggang and South Phyongan provinces, in order to get details of the rural situation.
					
					He convened a plenary meeting of heads of departments of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea in December that year, at which he delivered a historic speech "On Some Problems Arising in the Solution of the Socialist Rural Question".
					
					At the meeting, he first gave analysis of the reason that some countries failed to properly settle rural questions and the lessons derived therefrom, putting forward the principles and ways for settling the socialist rural question in Korea. 
					
					He then made public a famous work "Theses on the Socialist Rural Question in Our Country" at the 8th Plenary Meeting of the Fourth Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea on February 25, 1964.
					
					In the theses he indicated the principles, tasks and ways for rural construction on the basis of scientific analysis of the essence of the socialist rural question, the indispensable requirements of socialist rural construction and the nation's actual situation. 
					
					The theses were highly acclaimed in the country.
					
					The drive for implementing the theses had swept the country, which paved a way for successful settlement of the rural question.
					
					Rural communities underwent ideological, technical and cultural renovation and the state increased investment in agriculture.

articles.title: Minju Joson Terms "2012 White Paper on Unification" Hypocritical
articles.content:
Minju Joson Terms "2012 White Paper on Unification" Hypocritical
Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The south Korean "Ministry of Unification" recently issued "2012 white paper on unification" in which it claimed it has consistently pursued "the policy towards the north on its principle" and implemented its "flexibility step," adding that "the north was to blame for the stalemate of south-north dialogue". 
					Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard: 
					
					The "white paper" is a deceptive document to whitewash the south Korean regime's anti-reunification policy of confrontation and shift the responsibility for the deteriorated relations between the north and the south onto the north with lies and fabrications, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					The "policy towards the north" is aimed to antagonize the fellow countrymen in the north and do harm to them. 
					
					Two years ago, the puppet regime brought the north-south relations to collapse under the pretext of the warship sinking case, a hideous farce, and pushed the situation to the brink of war while refusing to receive an investigation group of the DPRK National Defence Commission. It went the lengths of recklessly firing shells into territorial waters of the north from the area of Yonphyong Island despite its repeated warnings but had to pay a dear price for its preemptive shelling.
					
					In stead of drawing a due lesson from it, the regime caused cases of firing bullets and shells at targets and putting up slogans to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, further escalating the confrontation with compatriots. 
					
					During the mourning period Ryu U Ik and other minions of the "Ministry of Unification" barred south Koreans in the Kaesong Industrial Zone from expressing condolences and snatched condolence messages sent by south Koreans to the DPRK and deleted all the expressions "demise, sorrow and condolences" from them, bringing to light their hypocritical nature of the "flexibility step".
					
					Those who derailed the north-south dialogue are now working hard to shift the blame for it onto the other. This reminds one of a thief crying "Stop the thief!"
					
					The above-said white paper is aimed to calm down the south Korean people who have turned out in a mass struggle to judge the group of traitors with the "National Assembly" election as an occasion.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Commemorating Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary as Great Holiday in National History
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Commemorating Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary as Great Holiday in National History
Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday editorially calls upon all the people to commemorate the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun) as a great holiday in the nation's history and achieve a great victory in the gigantic advance for a great surge in the drive to usher in a heyday for prosperity.
					The centenary of his birth will mark a great political festival demonstrating before the whole world the indomitable faith of all service personnel and people to give steady continuity to the history of the great sun for all ages, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					It serves, at the same time, as an occasion of eternally glorifying the history of a legendary great man produced by humankind and an auspicious holiday as it stirs up the immense pride of the Korean people going by the august name of the President.
					
					To commemorate the Day of the Sun with splendor is an important work to further glorify the undying feats of leader Kim Jong Il who remained true to the idea and cause of the President.
					
					It is thanks to Kim Jong Il's leadership that a steady continuity is given to the revolutionary history of the President.
					
					It is necessary to commemorate the Day of the Sun this year as a pleasant and happy holiday in which the people's happy laughter and hurrah for socialism will be heard as desired by Kim Jong Il so much in his lifetime.
					
					The army and people of the DPRK are called upon to fully display the spirit and stamina of Songun Korea under the uplifted slogan "The great Comrade Kim Il Sung and Comrade Kim Jong Il are always be with us".

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Realizing Desire of Participants in April 3 Popular Uprising
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Realizing Desire of Participants in April 3 Popular Uprising
Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday carries a bylined article on the lapse of 64 years since the south Koreans' April 3 Popular Uprising on Jeju Island. 
					The uprising was a righteous popular resistance against the U.S. and fascism to free south Korea from outsiders' domination and subjugation and a patriotic action that demonstrated the south Koreans' indomitable will and stamina to achieve the reunification of the country, the article says, and goes on:
					
					The Jeju islanders' bloody resistance taught all Koreans a lesson that they should fight against the aggressors and traitors to the last.
					
					More than 60 years have passed since the resistance on Jeju Island, but its participants' desire has not yet come true. It is attributable to the U.S. domination over south Korea and its policy of aggression on the DPRK and its lackeys pro-U.S. conservative forces' fascist dictatorship and confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					It is absolutely impossible to realize the desire and wishes of the south Korean people for social independence and democracy and national reunification unless a courageous mass struggle is waged in south Korea to terminate the U.S. domination and presence and the pro-U.S. conservative group's fascist rule.
					
					The article calls on all south Koreans to turn out in a mass campaign for putting an end to the U.S. domination and the conservative group's traitorous rule by reviving the indomitable fighting spirit and patriotic stamina displayed by the resistance fighters of Jeju Island and thus realize their desire without fail with the might of unity.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Lee Myung Bak Group's Confrontation Hysteria
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Lee Myung Bak Group's Confrontation Hysteria
Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak made persistent efforts to make the "nuclear issue of the north" a main topic of discussion at the "nuclear security summit" in Seoul and described the DPRK's planned satellite launch utterly irrelevant to the purpose of the summit as a "violation of the agreement" and "hideous provocation". 
					Park Geun Hye of the "Saenuri Party" and "Minister of Unification Ryu U Ik" let loose a spate of vituperation and rhetoric, echoing his reckless remarks.
					
					Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					The Lee group described the DPRK's projected satellite launch for peaceful purposes as a "provocation" and floated even the story about "long-range missile". This is nothing but a disgraceful behavior of the political half-wits utterly indifferent to the U.N. treaty and a serious provocation to push the north-south confrontation to the worst phase.
					
					Lee sought sinister aims in persistently finding fault with the DPRK's nuclear deterrent for self-defense and the planned satellite launch for peaceful purposes.
					
					One of them was to make workable the old anti-DPRK resolutions on sanctions that had remained long bankrupt due to public denunciation at home and abroad and kick up a new racket of sanctions and turn the situation in the run-up to "National Assembly election" favorable to the puppet group.
					
					The group also aimed to stage a frantic nuclear racket against the DPRK with the "nuclear security summit" as an occasion in a bid to divert elsewhere the attention of the public calling for "judging the regime" and bring under control the political situation before "National Assembly election" extremely unfavorable to it. 
					
					The Lee group worked hard to improve its bad image and turn public mind-set favorable to it with this meeting as a moment, but this brought to light its despicable true colors as U.S. colonial stooges, its nuclear war servants and confrontation maniacs.
					
					With neither gimmick nor artifice can the group of traitors hide its despicable true colors as a disturber of denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula and a maniac for a war against the north, concludes the commentary.

articles.title: DLAK Accuses Lee Myung Bak, Park Geun Hye of Their Human Rights Abuses
articles.content:
DLAK Accuses Lee Myung Bak, Park Geun Hye of Their Human Rights Abuses
Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- A new trade union of south Korean KBS recently disclosed a lot of documents on the indiscriminate illegal investigation into people from all walks of life which the room for supporting ethics of public officials under the Office of the puppet Prime Minister conducted from 2008 to 2010 at the instruction of Chongwadae, touching off south Korean public criticism of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors.
					A spokesman for the Democratic Lawyers Association of Korea in a statement made public Tuesday said the case of illegal investigation into civilians was a hideous abuse of human rights committed by the Lee Myung Bak regime in an organized manner in collusion with the ruling party to all intents and purposes.
					
					Since its seizure of power, the group has conducted a political investigation into people of all circles in a bid to maintain its "power". They included not only progressive pro-reunification movement organizations but also lawmakers, heads of public bodies appointed during the former regimes, the managers of major media, business persons and even ministers and vice-ministers.
					
					The authorities' policy of intelligence gathering and plot breeding was enforced and human rights abuses were perpetrated with the backing of the group of the ruling party.
					
					This group including Park Geun Hye has zealously cooperated in hiding the Lee group's above-said case.
					
					After systematically receiving records of investigation from the authorities, this group used them for slandering and attacking political rivals and opposition parties. It did not hesitate to perpetrate such dastardly act as wiretapping even the room of a representative of an opposition party inside the building of "the National Assembly."
					
					Successive former military fascist dictators also pursued policies of hatching plots including illegal investigation into civilians, but it is the first time that Chongwadae, repressive machine and the ruling party enforced an indiscriminate intelligence policy in collusion with one another just as the Lee-Park group did. 
					
					Much upset by the growing voices demanding the judgment of the Lee regime and the "Saenuri Party" in the wake of the disclosure of the above-said case, the group of traitors insisted that most of the disclosed documents on the illegal investigation date back to the period of the former regime in a desperate bid to calm down the uproar caused by it, the statement noted, and continued: 
					
					Park Geun Hye and her party are running the whole gamut of sleight of hand in an effort to evade the responsibility for the case, claiming that "Chongwadae" should be held responsible for it and they are also its "victim".
					
					As far as the illegal political investigation is concerned, this dates back to the period of the yusin dictatorial regime of Park Chung- Hee, the father of Park Geun Hye.
					
					Park Geun Hye, the daughter of the yusin dictator, and the "Saenuri Party", the group of the remnants of yusin, as well as Lee deserve punishment for being the masterminds of the case. 
					
					It is ridiculous, indeed, for the Lee-Park clan to kick up an anti-DPRK row over someone's "human rights" while wantonly abusing human rights by committing such unethical act stunning the world as the above-said case.
					
					It is as clear as daylight that if the "National Assembly" and the regime are dominated by this group of traitors again, south Korea will turn into more horrible tundra of human rights and a dark fascist society.

articles.title: Demonstration Calling for Oust of Puppet Regime Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Regime Hit for Illegal Investigation into Civilians
Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- South Korean students staged a demonstration in Seoul on Sunday denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for indiscriminate and illegal investigation into civilians. 
					They marched toward Chongwadae, chanting slogans "Regime engrossed in investigation of civilians, step down!" and "Lee Myung Bak regime of dictatorship, step down!" and scattering leaflets.
					
					The recent disclosure of the illegal investigation into civilians has brought to light the undemocratic crimes of the present regime, they said.
					
					They would judge the present regime at any cost through the  "National Assembly" election, they said, urging Lee Myung Bak to step down out of his own accord if he wants to evade the miserable end of the dictator.
					
					The riot police took away all the demonstrators.

articles.title: S. Korean People Call for Waging Action to Oust Traitor Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
S. Korean People Call for Waging Action to Oust Traitor Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The sit-in group to cope with the emergency situation for peace against war of south Korea held a meeting on March 31 calling for the ousting of traitor Lee Myung Bak who violated democracy through illegal investigation of civilians and increased the danger of a war through hostile policy toward the compatriots in the north.
					Present there were veterans of pro-reunification movement, youth and students and people from all walks of life including judicial, media and medical fields.
					
					Speakers at the meeting denounced the present regime for having engrossed in the treacherous policy, corruption and irregularities and illegal investigation of civilians.
					
					They called for judging Lee Myung Bak at any cost at the upcoming general election and forcing him to step down.
					
					In order to curb military tension from escalating and danger of a war mounting between the south and the north, it is necessary to prevent the present regime and the "Saenuri Party" from coming to power, they said.
					
					A joint declaration was read out at the meeting.
					
					The confrontation policy pursued by the Lee "government" steadily getting on the nerves of the north has stoked the danger of war, the declaration said, adding that they will not remain a passive onlooker to it.
					
					The present regime forsaken by the public is now finding itself in an unfavorable position ahead of the general election. So it is working hard to fabricate "north wind" to tide over the overall crisis, it stressed.
					
					The recent disclosure of illegal investigation was indicative of the serious abuses of the rights of the people, the declaration said, adding that the Lee "government' should be forced to immediately step down as it discriminately investigated civilians.
					
					All the people should turn out in the streets holding candle lights, it noted, calling for staging the action at the plaza of Seoul City Office on April 7 to judge Lee Myung Bak, arch criminal harassing the peace.

articles.title: Special Write-Up Carried in Paper Published by Koreans in Uzbekistan
articles.content:
Special Write-Up Carried in Paper Published by Koreans in Uzbekistan
Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Paper Thongil published by Koreans in Uzbekistan carried a special write-up on March 29.
					The paper carried news that a solemn national memorial service to mark the 100th day since the demise of leader Kim Jong Il was held in Pyongyang on March 25.
					
					It edited the news together with photos of compatriots in Uzbekistan holding the Korean national art festival in the run-up to the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: British Organizations Support DPRK's Planned Launch of Satellite
articles.content:
British Organizations Support DPRK's Planned Launch of Satellite
Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association released a joint statement on March 17 in support of the DPRK's planned launch of satellite.
					The DPRK will launch Kwangmyongsong-3 on the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung, the statement said, and continued:
					
					This event of special mention will more significantly decorate the Day of the Sun and strikingly demonstrate the might of the DPRK, independent socialist country.
					
					The launch of this satellite will signify a great victory of the Juche idea, the Songun idea and the independent national economy of the DPRK. It will serve as a valuable gift of the Korean people to the centenary of the birth of Kim Il Sung.
					
					Some countries are finding faults with the DPRK's plan for satellite launch.
					
					Why the DPRK's space plan should be considered as controversial though no one took issue with the U.S. space development?
					
					As it is an exercise of the sovereign right for the DPRK to launch a satellite, it allows no one to interfere in it.

articles.title: Nepali Personages Denounce U.S. and Its Followers' Moves against DPRK
articles.content:
Nepali Personages Denounce U.S. and Its Followers' Moves against DPRK
Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Basanta Kumar Shrestha, chairman of the International Committee for the Study of Songun Politics for Peaceful Reunification of Korea in Nepal, and its vice-chairman released a joint statement on March 27 denouncing the U.S. and its followers' moves against the DPRK's plan for satellite launch.
					We strongly demand the U.S. and its followers stop useless and irresponsible accusation against a sovereign state, they said, and continued:
					
					It is an exercise of a legitimate right as a sovereign state for the DPRK to launch a satellite on the occasion of the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					We vehemently condemn any act contrary to such noble cause.
					
					It is foolish to force the DPRK to give up its plan.
					
					We demand the U.S. and its followers stop at once the provocations against such sovereign states as the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Off Press in Austria
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Off Press in Austria
Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The work of President Kim Il Sung "10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country" was brought out in pamphlet by the Joseph Gebauer Publishing House in Vienna, Austria, on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					The work published on April 6, 1993 comprehensively indicates ways of achieving the great unity of the whole Korean nation. They include the issue of founding a unified state through the great unity of the whole nation and achieving unity based on patriotism and the spirit of national independence, the issue of promoting co-existence, co-prosperity and common interests and ending all political disputes that foment division and confrontation between fellow countrymen, the need for the north and the south to trust and unite with each other and the issue of joining hands on the road of national reunification, not rejecting each other for differing ism.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Commemorated in Nepal
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Commemorated in Nepal
Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Revolutionary Students Union of Nepal decided to commemorate with splendor the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung this year.
					The decision issued by the organization said:
					
					The Revolutionary Students Union of Nepal decides to commemorate with splendor the centenary of the birth of Kim Il Sung, an outstanding leader of the world socialist movement and eternal President of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, by organizing colorful political and cultural events. 
					
					The Union will organize colorful and significant political and cultural events including meeting, seminar, photo and book exhibition, mass demonstration, lecture and short course all over the country from the center to its lower units on the occasion of the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung.
					
					On the occasion of the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung, the Revolutionary Students Union of Nepal calls on the Nepalese working class and other people to have a proper understanding of the DPRK and turn out in the struggle against imperialism and decides to conduct diverse activities to this end.
					
					The Union will arrange a book and photo exhibition showing the immortal revolutionary career of Kim Il Sung and his exploits in different parts of Baktapur City on April 13 and 14.
					
					It will stage a meeting and demonstration holding anti-imperialist slogan boards and placards on April 15.
					
					It will hold various events in all areas between April 13 and May 13.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary Commemorated in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary Commemorated in Different Countries
Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Events were held in different countries on March 21 and 23 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					They included a seminar on his exploits in Kyrgyzstan and a book and handicraft exhibition and film show in Ecuador.
					
					Displayed in the venue of the exhibition were works of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, books on the greatness of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu and handicrafts associated with the wisdom and skills of the Korean people.
					
					The chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgys El" Republican Political Party said that Kim Il Sung, founder of socialist Korea, founded the immortal Juche idea and led the Korean revolution along the road of victory, guided by it.
					
					Kim Il Sung, the greatest man in the 20th century, is always alive in the minds of all people.
					
					Speakers including the chairman of the Trade Unions' Association in Bolivar Province, Ecuador noted that the exhibition and film show offered Ecuadorians an opportunity to keenly realize that the DPRK has already confidently emerged a power in all fields including politics, economy and military affairs.
					
					Noting that the DPRK makes the progressive people and revolutionaries of the world feel proud of it, they expressed support and solidarity with the Korean people in their drive for building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Costa Rica Political Figure on New Century of Kim Il Sung's Korea
articles.content:
Costa Rica Political Figure on New Century of Kim Il Sung's Korea
Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea and the people of the DPRK will glorify a new century of Kim Il Sung's Korea as a period of prosperity and proud victory under the banner of the Juche idea and the Songun idea, said Humberto Vargas Carbonel, general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Vanguard of Costa Rica, in his statement on Mar. 26.
					All the Korean people and the world progressives are commemorating with splendor the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung as the greatest holiday of Kim Il Sung's nation and a great event in human history, he said, and continued:
					
					Kim Jong Un, the supreme leader of the WPK, state and army of the DPRK, serves as a banner of victory and glory of Songun Korea and a centre of the WPK's unity and cohesion and leadership.
					
					All the service personnel and people of the DPRK remain true to his leadership as a bulwark and shield with firm faith in devotedly protecting him.
					
					The Korean people will invariably keep to the road of independence, Songun and socialism explored by Kim Il Sung and successfully carried forward by leader Kim Jong Il and carry on the revolutionary march started on Mt. Paektu under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: BRICS Not 'Obliged' to Follow U.S. Sanctions on Iran
articles.content:
BRICS Not 'Obliged' to Follow U.S. Sanctions on Iran
Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- India, China and other BRICS countries Wednesday said they will not sever their trade ties with oil-rich Iran, which is facing U.S. sanctions against its nuclear program.
					UN resolutions do not forbid BRICS countries to engage in trade in essential commodities, Indian Commerce and Industry Minister Anand Sharma said, addressing a joint a press conference with other BRICS trade ministers.
					
					Chinese Commerce Minister Chen Deming said his country is 'not obliged to follow any domestic laws and rules of any particular country'.

articles.title: BRICS Commerce Ministers Urge Trade Coordination, Stable Oil Price
articles.content:
BRICS Commerce Ministers Urge Trade Coordination, Stable Oil Price
Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- BRICS commerce ministers called for resisting protectionist tendencies, explored detailed measures of trade cooperation among BRICS countries and underlined the importance of stable oil price for global economy recovery during the second BRICS commerce ministers' meeting held in New Delhi, India on March 28.
					The Joint Press Release of the meeting said that the ministers directed their officials to explore ways and means for enhancing and furthering intra-BRICS cooperation especially in the areas of customs, investment, etc.

articles.title: Iran's IRGC Vows to Seriously Deal with Any Threat
articles.content:
Iran's IRGC Vows to Seriously Deal with Any Threat
Tehran, April 2 (KCNA) -- Iran's Islamic Revolution Guards Corps (IRGC) said Saturday that it will seriously deal with any threat against the country, the official IRNA news agency reported.
					"The IRGC under wise leadership of the supreme leader of the Islamic revolution will spare no efforts to defend the country and seriously deal with any types of threats or dangers which might threaten the country's territorial integrity," the IRGC said in a statement.
					
					IRGC's statement came as the United States and Israel are pushing the international community for further pressures against the Islamic republic.

articles.title: Palestinian Killed in Israeli Fire in Northern Gaza
articles.content:
Palestinian Killed in Israeli Fire in Northern Gaza
Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The Israeli army persists in oppression upon the Palestinians despite protest and denunciation of the international community.
					A Palestinian youth was killed shortly after he was wounded by Israeli gunfire during clashes in northern Gaza Strip on Friday, medical sources said.
					
					Palestinian demonstrators clashed with the Israeli security forces, leaving dozens injured.

articles.title: 4 Killed in U.S. Drone Strike in NW Pakistan
articles.content:
4 Killed in U.S. Drone Strike in NW Pakistan
Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The U.S. forces in Afghanistan continued to kill Pakistanis under the signboard of "anti-terrorism".
					At least four people were killed in a U.S. drone strike launched early Friday morning in Pakistan's northwest tribal area of North Waziristan, reported local media.

articles.title: Missile Deployment Protested in Japan
articles.content:
Missile Deployment Protested in Japan
Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- A demo took place recently in Naha City of Okinawa Prefecture, Japan in protest against interceptor missile deployment.
					Peace activists and many other people, who took part in the demonstration, denounced the authorities for planning to deploy interceptor missiles on the islands of Okinawa and Ishigaki.
					
					They held a meeting outside the prefectural office before marching along the city streets. They said dangerous act that may lead to a war should be avoided, strongly condemning the authorities' moves for missile deployment.

articles.title: Cooperation among Different Countries
articles.content:
Cooperation among Different Countries
Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Azerbaijan and Kyrgyzstan signed six bilateral agreements during the official visit of Kyrgyzstani President Almazbek Atambayev, the press service of the Azerbaijani President announced Friday.
					The two sides sealed deals on cooperation in fighting illegal trade of drugs and psychotropic substances and their precursors, mutual assistance in the observation of tax legislation, cooperation in culture, civil defense, emergency response and prevention, as well as a protocol on Azerbaijan's membership to the World Trade Organization.
					
					Colombia and Panama signed a document on border security plan between the two countries on March 28.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita a Macky Sall
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita a Macky Sall
Pyongyang, 3 de abril (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 3 un mensaje de felicitacion al electo presidente de la Republica del Senegal, Macky Sall.
					Convencido de que continuaran fortaleciendose y desarrollandose las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion existentes entre los dos paises, el remitente desea de todo corazon al destinatario exitos en sus labores responsables para la unidad nacional y el desarrollo socioeconomico.

articles.title: Vestidos de marca "Unha"
articles.content:
Vestidos de marca "Unha"
Pyongyang, 3 de abril (ACNC) -- Tienen gran aceptacion los vestidos de marca "Unha" en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Crecen las demandas sobre esos productos en el Almacen No. 1 de Pyongyang, el Supermercado del Area de Kwangbok y otras unidades de la red comercial.
					
					En opinion de los compradores, las prendas de marca "Unha" son bien confeccionadas, elegantes y confortables sobre todo.
					
					En particular, estan de moda los trajes, abrigos y monos deportivos para ambos generos que se producen en la Fabrica de Ropas Unha de Tongdaewon.
					
					Consultado por la ACNC, el gerente de la fabrica Choe Yong Nam (55 anos de edad), dijo que el desarrollo constante de los productos de nueva tecnologia es un problema muy importante y agrego que se propone ampliar el terreno en el mercado nacional y el mundial al mejorar la calidad de todos los productos manteniendo su originalidad.
					
					En nuestra fabrica se modernizan todos los procesos desde el diseno hasta la confeccion y se libra una campana para aplicar las tecnologias sofisticadas en la produccion, explico.
					
					Los vestidos hechos en la fabrica se exportan a muchos paises del Sudeste Asiatico y Europa.

articles.title: Bolsas de marca "Okaedongmu"
articles.content:
Bolsas de marca "Okaedongmu"
Pyongyang, 3 de abril (ACNC) -- Las bolsas de marca "Okaedongmu", disenadas y hechas en la Compania Comercial General Sangmyong de Corea, se venden ampliamente en varias unidades de la red comercial, incluyendo el Almacen No. 1 de Pyongyang, el Supermercado del Area de Kwangbok y el Almacen Pothonggang.
					Kim Kum Ju (de 30 anos de edad), obrera de la Hilanderia Kim Jong Suk de Pyongyang, y otras capitalinas entrevistadas con la ACNC al pie del mostrador del Supermercado del Area de Kwangbok dijeron que tanto las amas de casa como las muchachas prefieren las bolsas de marca "Okaedongmu" con diferentes formas y adornos.
					
					Ellas avienen al gusto de la poblacion femenina y aseguran al maximo el confort.
					
					La compania produce tambien la bolsa pequena para las muchachas que se pega bien con Chimajogori, vestimenta tipica de la coreana.
					
					Las maletas y mochilas estan en boga entre los deportistas.
					
					Segun Pak Kyong Im (de 43 anos de edad), jefa de la oficina de disenos de la compania, se logra innovacion en el desarrollo de nuevos productos gracias a los esfuerzos constantes de los especialistas.
					
					Las muestras presentadas por la seccion obtuvieron visto bueno en varias unidades de produccion como la Fabrica de Articulos de Uso Diario de Pyongyang y la Fabrica de Bolsas de Phyongchon.

articles.title: Minju Joson comenta "carta blanca de reunificacion de 2012" de Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Minju Joson comenta "carta blanca de reunificacion de 2012" de Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 3 de abril (ACNC) -- Recientemente, el ministerio titere de Reunificacion del Sur de Corea publico la "carta blanca de reunificacion de 2012" en que elogio a si mismo argumentando que la parte surena "impulso la politica invariable hacia el Norte a base de los principios" y tomo "las medidas flexibles" y escribio que "se suspendio el dialogo intercoreano por culpa del Norte".
					La "carta blanca" de la banda de traidores surcoroeanos es un documento lleno de fraude y estafa encaminado a embellecer su politica anti-reunificacion y de confrontacion e imputar a otro la culpabilidad de la congelacion de las relaciones N-S.
					
					Asi subraya el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual divulgado este martes y continua:
					
					La "politica sobre el Norte a base de los principios" impulsada de "manera invariable" por  los titeres surcoreanos, es la politica de confrontacion destinada a hostilizar, denigrar y perjudicar a  sus compatriotas.
					
					Hace dos anos, ellos congelaron las relaciones intercoreanas so pretexto del caso de hundimiento de la corbeta de tamano especial llevando la situacion al borde de la guerra, mientras no aceptaron obstinadamente la inspeccion del grupo de averiguacion del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. Para colmo, pese a las repetidas advertencias de esta, lanzaron en la isla de Yonphyong y sus contornos proyectiles en el area jurisdiccional de la RPDC, con lo cual pagaron el precio muy caro. Pero, en vez de sacar la leccion de los casos anteriores, los belicistas titeres difamaron la maxima dignidad de la RPDC provocando el incidente de blancos y consignas insultantes, dando mas acicate a las maniobras de confrontacion fratricida.
					
					Ryu U Ik y otros tipejos del ministerio de Reunificacion obligaron a los surcoreanos en la Zona Industrial de Kaesong para que en el periodo del gran duelo nacional no expresaran sus condolencias por el deceso del Dirigente Kim Jong Il y borraron en los mensajes de condolencias de los habitantes surcoreanos todas las expresiones como "deceso", "condolencia" y "duelo", relevando asi el caracter fraudulento de las "medidas flexibles".
					
					Los congeladores del dialogo N-S tratan de imputar su responsabilidad a otro, lo que es igual a la conducta de un ladron que levanta primero palo.
					
					Los tipejos del citado ministerio divulgan el documento mentiroso para ganar la opinion publica del Sur de Corea que se ha levantado en la lucha masiva por sentenciar a la banda de traidores en visperas de las elecciones de parlamentarios.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia fiebre conflictiva de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia fiebre conflictiva de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 3 de abril (ACNC) -- Hace poco, el traidor surcoreano Lee Myung Bak actuo obstinadamente para hacer del "problema nuclear del Norte" el punto principal de debate en la "cumbre de seguridad nuclear" de Seul.
					Cuestiono el plan de lanzamiento del satelite artificial de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, que no tiene nada que ver con la agenda de la cumbre, como "violacion del acuerdo" y "provocacion de gravedad".
					
					Park Geun-hye del "Partido Saenuri" y Ryu U Ik, ministro titere de Reunificacion del Sur de Corea, pronunciaron tambien otros chismes sobre la RPDC.
					
					En un comentario individual difundido este martes, el diario Rodong Sinmun precisa que la banda de Lee describe el lanzamiento del satelite artificial con fines pacificos de la RPDC como "provocacion" y "misil balistico de largo alcance".
					
					Eso significa un acto bochornoso de los politicos iletrados que no toman en consideracion ni el Tratado de la ONU y una grave provocacion que lleva la confrontacion fratricida a la peor fase, comienza el diario y continua:
					
					La acusacion de Lee parte de su siniestro objetivo de dar vigor a las desgastadas resoluciones de sancion anti-RPDC que han sido condenadas por los nacionales y extranjeros, levantar la nueva oleada de sancion y cambiar la desfavorable situacion de las "elecciones de parlamentarios".
					
					Ademas, su camarilla intenta recrudecer la campana nuclear anti-RPDC aprovechando la cumbre de Seul con el proposito de distraer la atencion de los habitantes de diferentes sectores que reclaman "sentenciar al poder" en las inminentes elecciones generales.
					
					Aunque ella trato de mejorar su imagen y recuperar la aceptacion popular caida al suelo, no tuvo otro resultado que mostrar su asquerosa fachada de lacayo colonial para la guerra nuclear de EE.UU. y maniaco de confrontacion fratricida.
					
					La horda del traidor Lee Myung Bak no puede ocultar de ninguna manera su atributo de estropeadores de desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana y de fanaticos por desatar la guerra anti-RPDC.
